column5: I need to make a website that has a shopping cart option, basically an online store. I have no idea where to start. It has to be very professional looking and I won't be making it myself.  If you have any site suggestions or know some good website designers let me know  Thanks
Whats the content going to be on the site Dan? On of my buddies does it on the side.
Mainly these  http://www.cambridgeelevating.com/decklifts.html  We have the site basically down. Just need to add the store part
Okay let me ask him before I flip you his email. I remember talking about possibly getting you guys in with us at work, but we stopped customs like that.  I'll let you know shortly.
K my guy is a no go. Sorry, send Stoty an email, I think he used to do programming and web design, hes quiet on here lately though.
You guys are a tough nut to crack lol
Dan just Google "internet shopping cart". Everything is there.
